page.title: 08Show and Community Council
page.content: Johnstone Show is held every year in August and is a very popular event in the community. There are classes for baking, handwork, flowers, vegetables and a childrens' class. There are always sports held in the afternoon for old and young alike. The show has been going on every year since about 1924. Johnstone Community Council started in 1977 and is going from strength to strength. There are various events held every year including a Car Treasure Hunt, an outing for the Senior Citizens, a Fun Day for the children, and Social Evenings. This year the first Burns Supper for 27 years was a great success. The W.R.I.,started in 1926, used to meet in the school but now meets through the winter in the Parish Hall.
